# [Interview #483: TGS Signing Report - Frenzy, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=483#5)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Biggest story-related bombshell (IMHO): Don't assume Rand and Moridin are linked.
